entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
